name: switch
docstring: A toggle switch alternative to the checkbox.

properties.name: as_child
properties.docstring: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

properties.name: default_checked
properties.docstring: Whether the switch is checked by default

properties.name: disabled
properties.docstring: If true, prevent the user from interacting with the switch

properties.name: required
properties.docstring: If true, the user must interact with the switch to submit the form

properties.name: name
properties.docstring: The name of the switch (when submitting a form)

properties.name: value
properties.docstring: The value associated with the "on" position

properties.name: high_contrast
properties.docstring: Whether to render the switch with higher contrast color against background

events.name: on_change
events.docstring: Fired when the value of the switch changes
